introduction: Hello everyone, I'm a full-stack developer with 12+ year experience, demonstrated history in software industry.
Passionate about new technologies, constantly keep myself updated and enjoy working in a team.

technical_highlight.summary: With my years of experience, I can offer alot of benefits and flexibility:
highlights: I can work in almost all technical positions from frontend to backend or devops engineer.
Solid understanding and hands-on experience in programming design patterns.
Hands-on experience in software architechture, particularly micro-services, containerized applications and distributed systems.
The last two years, I have also got into data analysis and machine learning.
Handle all technical work (design/architechture/develop/deploy) on all 3 business applications.
Handle software release management process, work as release manager.
Work as Devops engineer, migrate TFS code to Azure DevOps, setting up build/release pipelines.
Development & coordinate with other developers, testers, implementers and release manager.
Consult/support clients on a wide range of Hexagon geospatial software.
Involve in the whole software development cycle, design/develop/test/deploy software on the client environments, then provide support.
Coordinate & provide technical advises for overseas team to do development.
Develop/extend features for the company's accounting software.
Perform data migration on the Cortell software for clients.

skill_notes: Part of daily work for years.
Have advanced knowledge of the language.
Last 5+ years, use more ES6 version.

Currently work on DotNet Framework 4.6 & DotNet Core 3.1, will update to 5 soon.

Hands-on experience in using its common state management libraries such as Redux.
